description: As France mourns the killing of three people at a church in the city, this is what we know so far.
title: France attack: What we know about the stabbings in Nice
title_page: France attack: What we know about the stabbings in Nice - BBC News
maintext: One of them, named by French media as 55-year-old Vincent Loqu¨¨s, was a devout Catholic who reportedly worked at the basilica for more than 10 years. He was a sexton, or lay member of staff, responsible for maintenance and welcoming visitors to the church.
